settings.text: Woman-owned store in Lincoln, Nebraska offering Korean skincare, authentic crystals, and EMF shielding for thoughtful, modern living.

settings.caption: Our Story
settings.heading: From Lincoln, Nebraska — With Love and Intention
settings.text: Born in the heartland, Wax | Wane reflects the grounded pace and quiet integrity of Nebraska life. Founded and owned by a woman with a lifelong fascination for design and detail, the store began as a small experiment in thoughtful living. Today, it connects the heartland’s sense of honesty with a modern, global reach — from Korean skincare to handcrafted goods and authentic crystals, all selected for their usefulness and beauty.

settings.caption: OUR CORE VALUES
settings.heading: Why Shop Wax | Wane?
settings.text: Like the moon, we move through phases — growth, rest, reflection. Our collection mirrors that rhythm: Korean skincare for renewal, natural crystals for grounding, and EMF shielding for balance in a modern, connected world. Each category is chosen with precision, sourced ethically, and shared with transparency.

settings.caption: How We Source & Create
settings.heading: Quality, Provenance, and Proof Over Hype
settings.text: We work only with trusted suppliers and makers who value authenticity over trend. Every crystal is undyed, naturally formed, and evaluated for clarity and structure. Our EMF gear is tested for real shielding, refined for design, and ready to ship quickly through Amazon and Walmart Prime. Even our skincare partners are selected for clinical integrity and gentle formulations.

Wax | Wane is a woman-owned small business rooted in Lincoln, Nebraska — a place that values honesty, craftsmanship, and patience. What began as a passion for beautiful, functional things has grown into a space where modern design meets mindful living.

Whether you’re discovering authentic crystals, science-led Korean skincare, or reliable EMF shielding, we’re honored to be part of your search for what feels true. Take your time exploring. Everything here was chosen with care, made to last, and meant to be used.

Shop intentionally. Live thoughtfully. From the heartland, with love.
Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.
